  • Field Details

    • allParts

      private final javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> allParts

    • allProducts

      private final javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> allProducts

    • instance

      private static final Inventory instance
      Singleton instance of the Inventory class. This instance is created at the time the class is loaded and is accessed by calling this static variable.

  • Constructor Details

    • Inventory

      private Inventory()
      A private constructor for the Inventory class. Initializes the allParts and allProducts lists with empty observable array lists.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Inventory getInstance()
      Returns the single instance of the Inventory class. If no instance of Inventory exists, one will be created.
      Returns:
      the single instance of the Inventory class.

    • addPart

      public void addPart(Part newPart)
      Adds a new part to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      newPart - the part to add

    • addProduct

      public void addProduct(Product newProduct)
      Adds the given Product to the list of all products.
      Parameters:
      newProduct - the Product object to be added to the inventory

    • lookupPart

      public Part lookupPart(int partId)
      Searches for a Part object in the inventory by its ID.
      Parameters:
      partId - the ID of the Part to look up
      Returns:
      the Part object with the specified ID, or null if not found

    • lookupProduct

      public Product lookupProduct(int productId)
      Looks up a Product by its ID.
      Parameters:
      productId - the ID of the Product to lookup
      Returns:
      the found Product or null if not found

    • lookupPart

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> lookupPart(String partName)
      Looks up and returns a list of parts whose names contain the given partName. If partName is empty or null, returns all parts in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      partName - the string to search for in the names of the parts
      Returns:
      an observable list of parts that contain partName in their names

    • lookupProduct

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> lookupProduct(String productName)
      Searches for products that contain the provided product name. If the provided name is blank, returns all products in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      productName - the name of the product to search for.
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of products containing the provided name or all products if the provided name is blank.

    • updatePart

      public void updatePart(int index, Part selectedPart)
      Updates an existing part in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the part to be updated
      selectedPart - the updated part object to replace the existing part

    • updateProduct

      public void updateProduct(int index, Product selectedProduct)
      Updates the product at the given index with the given selectedProduct.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the product to update.
      selectedProduct - The updated product to replace the existing product at the given index.

    • deletePart

      public boolean deletePart(Part selectedPart)
      Deletes the given Part from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      selectedPart - The Part to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the Part was found and removed from the inventory, false otherwise.

    • deleteProduct

      public boolean deleteProduct(Product selectedProduct)
      Removes the specified product from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      selectedProduct - the product to remove
      Returns:
      true if the product was successfully removed, false otherwise

    • getAllParts

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> getAllParts()
      Returns an ObservableList containing all parts in the inventory.
      Returns:
      the ObservableList of all parts in the inventory

    • getAllProducts

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> getAllProducts()
      Returns an observable list of all products in the inventory.
      Returns:
      an observable list of all products in the inventory.
